title: In Order To Survive, I Had To Fall in Love With the Heroine - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Shoujo Ai   Yuri
tags: Acting   Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Showbiz   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: 美羊羊公主殿下
description:
Ye Wan transmigrated into a dog blood novel into a female partner with the same name and surname as her. Naturally, the female partner ending was tragic.

The system told her that she could only live if she was full of the protagonist's favor, otherwise she would be in danger of death at any time.

Ye Wan wondered: So do I attack the male lead?

System: What are you thinking? You stupid melon seed brain! Marry Bai Fumei! White, rich and beautiful! You listen to me! I'm asking you to be with the heroine!

Ye Wan: ? ? ?

Okay, in order to survive, Ye Wan decided to give it a try.

Ye Wan: If you don't like me, I will die.

Shen Yu: Are you threatening me to be with you with suicide?

Ye Wan: I'm not, don't get me wrong!!!

In the beginning...
Ye Wan: I'm straight.
Shen Yu: Who isn't?

Later...
Ye Wan: I'm straight.
Shen Yu: Oh.

Last...
Ye Wan: I'm straight.
Shen Yu: No, you're not.

End...
Ye Wan: Ok baby, I love you. Mwuh~>
